data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Isla de la Juventud, Cuba who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Isla de la Juventud, Cuba

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Isla de la Juventud, Cuba.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 8 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Isla de la Juventud, Cuba.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 86,400 souls living in the state of Isla de la Juventud with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Nueva Gerona
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Nueva Gerona, Isla de la Juventud, Cuba.
Father, convict the 9,794 believers in Isla de la Juventud to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Isla de la Juventud, Cuba, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.section_summary:
the state of Isla de la Juventud, Cuba has a population of 86,400.

We estimate Isla de la Juventud has 9,794 people who might know Jesus, 38,773 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 37,833 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 8 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Isla de la Juventud to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.
